title: Negotiate Group Room Rate
description: A client for a large conference wants to negotiate a lower room rate than was initially proposed.

tasks.description: Review the event's overall value, including F&B spend and meeting room rental, to determine how much flexibility exists on the room rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes the total potential revenue from the event.

tasks.description: Check the hotel's occupancy forecast for the event dates to see if there is a high demand.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees that demand is moderate, allowing for some flexibility.

tasks.description: Offer a revised, slightly lower rate and present it as a final offer to secure the business.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes a counter-offer to the client.
